cast.name: 安德丽雅·凯利 Andrea Kelley

introduction: At the end of a long night at her punk-rock bar, all Lucy wants to do is meet up with her boyfriend Randall who she suspects is cheating on her. But when Lucy discovers Amber, a 15-year-old girl, passed out in a bathroom stall, she finds she’s stuck with her.An unsuccessful attempt to dump Amber at a hospital leads to a long night involving a showdown outside a strip club, a screaming match with an irate soccer mom and a Trans Am covered in puke. Through it all, Lucy’s bravado and sexy swagger are a revelation to the young girl, and as the night wears on, it becomes clear that this chance encounter may be just what each of them needed.
